item.title: Passenger Notice System (No Smoking/Fasten Seat Belt/Return to Cabin) Signs

remarks.para: No Smoking/Fasten Seat Belt/Return to Cabin signs may be inoperative and the affected passenger seat(s), cabin attendant(s) seat(s), lavatories, or crew rest areas maybe occupied provided:

numlitem.para: Passenger Address System is operative and can be clearly heard throughout the cabin during flight, and
PA system is used to alert the cabin crew and to notify passengers when seat belts should be fastened and smoking is prohibited.
The flight crew will ensure that all persons in the upper deck are notified when seat belts should be fastened.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "NO SMOKING/FASTEN SEAT BELT SIGN INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
